creator: ben.janes@se.bluewave.com
text:
Hi,

After many hours I finally got slide to sort of work, still at a loss someplaces, any 
resources? Anyway, with Tomcat 4.1.12 I took slide.war, slide-admin.war from the slide 1.0.16 
zip distribution and put them in my webapps. I then put users: root and guest into the tomcat-
users.xml. 
went to localhost:8080/slide-admin 
logged in as root, password root 
and got 
this error.



org.apache.jasper.JasperException: 
org/apache/slide/common/SlideToken
